name: MagnetBox
description:
Puzzle game with magnets. Playable with browser (mobile supported)

Weekly Game Jam 248 submission.

Level editor | GitHub | Mirror

Tools used:

  • HaxeFlixel
  • Aseprite (pixel editor)
  • Ogmo Editor (tilemap editor)

Sound credits:

  • Hansjörg Malthaner: https://opengameart.org/content/rockmetal-slide
  • https://www.videvo.net/sound-effect/anvil-single-hit-01/397492/
  • https://www.videvo.net/sound-effect/anvil-single-strike-02/397500/
  • https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/game/
